383680.name: Void & Meddler - Soundtrack Ep. 1
383680.description:
Imagine, the world takes you away from your life. Let yourself dream as you are lulled by the cold and shamanic rhythm of synthesizers.
Feel the emotions locked in your body's memory, all kinds of emotions. And don't try to control them.
This is Void&Meddler original soundtrack!



Tracklist:
  • Cellular Automaton
  • Slow Motion Sickness
  • Atom Of Light
  • White Habits
  • Looking In Garbages
  • Häxan
  • Looking For Treble
  • Corvo House
  • Movement/Transformation
  • Red is my son
  • Aktacy
  • 1/4 alive
  • Murdock is a bug
  • We're only briefly here
  • Night loop
